original_title: Sri Lanka coconut auction prices up 5.1-pct
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s coconut auction prices gained 5.1 percent from a week ago at an auction on May 25, data showed.
The average price for 1,000 nuts increased to 69,699.63 from 66,301.51 a week earlier at the weekly auction conducted by Sri Lanka’s Coconut Development Authority.
The highest price was 75,200 rupees for 1,000 nuts slightly up from the previous week’s 75,100 rupees, while the lowest was 76,500 up from 61,000 rupees.
The auction offered 678,770 coconuts and 512,848 nuts were sold. (Colombo/May25/2023)
